name: chicagotribune
text:
The pandemic canceled his senior season Mount Carmel High School. No matter for the Cubs, who picked him in the first round and called it "literally our best-case scenario."

He will have to swap his allegiance from South to North Side, however. https://t.co/xkMIgqauxf
